p.s: The speech Remarks of president Barack Obama at student roundtable given at April 7th, 2009 in Istanbul, deals with the importance of intercultural understanding and student exchanges.
In the introduction of the speech, Barack Obama tells the reason why he came to Turkey, the relationship between the USA and the people of the Muslim world (l. 2).
In the following sentences he gave an insight of the americanAmerican youth and their spirit of activism and responsibility.

In the mainpartmain part, he indirectly speaks to the roundtable, in which he takes a part in the moment, wherever I travel abroad and speak to groups like this (l. 7) and he tells them how important and strong a single exchange for the students can be, it can break down walls (l. 13), because people come together and share experience.
Barack also gave the speachspeech, because the USA has not been forever a country which is known as a good place for a student exchange.

In the end of the speech (l. 18-22) Obama emphasizes the importance of exchanges for the governments, the pursuit of lasting peace, that you will find a partner, a supporter and a friend in the United States of America.
The speech has been very succesfulsuccessful because americaAmerica is now one of the most visited countryscountries and most popular ones for student exchanges.
